response.original_title: Gaither Gospel Series The Best of The Cathedrals
response.overview: Hosted by George Younce and Bill Gaither, The Best Of The Cathedrals brings together the very best of George Younce and Glen Payne during their most vibrant days and honors the brilliant 50-year legacy of the Cathedrals. This rare collection of footage not only includes the Cathedrals' best performances from the Homecoming video series, but features never-before-seen performances from the Cathedrals' archives, plus an intimate interview with the Glen Payne family and, as always, lots of laughs. Spring House is pleased to bring you this special video treasure so you can now enjoy these great memories whenever you need a smile!
response.tagline: Hosted by Bill Gaither and George Younce
response.title: Gaither Gospel Series The Best of The Cathedrals
